verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe הַיֹּרְדִ֤ים <WH3381> to them that go down מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> to Egypt לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5833> for help עַל־ <WH5921> on סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> on horses יִשָּׁעֵ֑נוּ <WH8172> and stay וַיִּבְטְח֨וּ <WH982> and trust עַל־ <WH5921> in רֶ֜כֶב <WH7393> in chariots כִּ֣י <WH3588> because רָ֗ב <WH7227> because [they are] many וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> and in פָּֽרָשִׁים֙ <WH6571> and in horsemen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָצְמ֣וּ <WH6105> strong מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> because they are very וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor שָׁעוּ֙ <WH8159> but they look עַל־ <WH5921> unto קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> not unto the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH1875> neither seek

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also ה֤וּא <WH1931> he חָכָם֙ <WH2450> Yet he also [is] wise וַיָּ֣בֵא <WH935> and will bring רָ֔ע <WH7451> evil וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָ֖יו <WH1697> his words לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not הֵסִ֑יר <WH5493> and will not call back וְקָם֙ <WH6965> but will arise עַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> against the house מְרֵעִ֔ים <WH7489> of the evildoers וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against עֶזְרַ֖ת <WH5833> and against the help פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> of them that work אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> iniquity

וּמִצְרַ֤יִם <WH4714> Now the Egyptians אָדָם֙ <WH120> [are] men וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אֵ֔ל <WH410> and not God וְסוּסֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5483> and their horses בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> flesh וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> and not spirit וַֽיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> When the LORD יַטֶּ֣ה <WH5186> shall stretch out יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְכָשַׁ֤ל <WH3782> shall fall עוֹזֵר֙ <WH5826> both he that helpeth וְנָפַ֣ל <WH5307> shall fall down עָזֻ֔ר <WH5826> and he that is holpen וְיַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together כֻּלָּ֥ם <WH3605> and all יִכְלָיֽוּן׃ <WH3615> and they all shall fail ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> thus אָֽמַר־ <WH559> spoken יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> For thus hath the LORD אֵלַ֡י <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יֶהְגֶּה֩ <WH1897> roaring הָאַרְיֵ֨ה <WH738> unto me Like as the lion וְהַכְּפִ֜יר <WH3715> and the young lion עַל־ <WH5921> over טַרְפּ֗וֹ <WH2964> on his prey אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִקָּרֵ֤א <WH7121> is called forth עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> Against מְלֹ֣א <WH4393> when a multitude רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> of shepherds מִקּוֹלָם֙ <WH6963> of their voice לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יֵחָ֔ת <WH2865> against him [he] will not be afraid וּמֵֽהֲמוֹנָ֖ם <WH1995> himself for the noise לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יַֽעֲנֶ֑ה <WH6031> nor abase כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> So יֵרֵד֙ <WH3381> come down יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of them so shall the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לִצְבֹּ֥א <WH6633> to fight עַל־ <WH5921> over הַר־ <WH2022> for mount צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Zion וְעַל־ <WH5921> over גִּבְעָתָֽהּ׃ <WH1389> and for the hill

כְּצִפֳּרִ֣ים <WH6833> As birds עָפ֔וֹת <WH5774> flying כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> so יָגֵ֛ן <WH1598> defend יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> so will the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עַל־ <WH5921> and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem גָּנ֥וֹן <WH1598> defending וְהִצִּ֖יל <WH5337> also he will deliver פָּסֹ֥חַ <WH6452> [it and] passing over וְהִמְלִֽיט׃ <WH4422> he will preserve
שׁ֗וּבוּ <WH7725> Turn לַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> whom הֶעְמִ֥יקוּ <WH6009> have deeply סָרָ֖ה <WH5627> revolted בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> ye unto [him from] whom the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּ֚י <WH3588> that בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> For in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יִמְאָס֗וּן <WH3988> shall cast away אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man אֱלִילֵ֣י <WH457> his idols כַסְפּ֔וֹ <WH3701> of silver וֶאֱלִילֵ֖י <WH457> and his idols זְהָב֑וֹ <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> have made לָכֶ֛ם יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3027> which your own hands חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> unto you [for] a sin

וְנָפַ֤ל <WH5307> fall אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> Then shall the Assyrian בְּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> with the sword לֹא־ <WH3808> not אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> not of a mighty man וְחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> and the sword לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָדָ֖ם <WH120> not of a mean man תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> shall devour וְנָ֥ס <WH5127> him but he shall flee לוֹ֙ מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> from חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> the sword וּבַחוּרָ֖יו <WH970> and his young men לָמַ֥ס <WH4522> shall be discomfited יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> will become

וְסַלְעוֹ֙ <WH5553> to his strong hold מִמָּג֣וֹר <WH4032> for fear יַֽעֲב֔וֹר <WH5674> And he shall pass over וְחַתּ֥וּ <WH2865> shall be afraid מִנֵּ֖ס <WH5251> of the ensign שָׂרָ֑יו <WH8269> and his princes נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose א֥וּר <WH217> whose fire לוֹ֙ בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> [is] in Zion וְתַנּ֥וּר <WH8574> and his furnace ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem ס
